column3: Graduates  from Christopher Newport University with degree in Physics.
Starts working on  xkcd  full time after  NASA stops renewing his contract  .

Gets nominated for "Outstanding Use of the Medium", "Outstanding Short Form Comic", and "Outstanding Comedic Comic", and wins "Outstanding Single Panel Comic" in the  2008 Web Cartoonists' Choice Awards  .
Announces  his fiancée was diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer.
Gets nominated  for "Best Fan Artist" in the 2011 Hugo Awards.
Gets nominated  for "Best Fan Artist" in the 2012 Hugo Awards.
The asteroid  4942 Munroe  is named  after him  .
Wins  the 2014 Hugo Awards for "Best Graphic Story" thanks to  1190: Time  .
